refsect2.para: Setting one or more attributes of a property.
refsect2.variablelist:
-p/--properties PROPERTIES...
&propertydesc;
It is possible to use subproperties. For example: "-p property1/property2/property3"
<dm:property1> <dm:property2> <dm:property3/> </dm:property2> </dm:property1>
-a/--attributes ATTRIBUTES...
Attributes of an XML tag. Like: <dm:property attribute1="myvalue" attribute2="test"/>
Schema for attributes: attribute=value
Multiple attributes are possible. Examples: -a attr=val,attr2=val2 or -a attr=val -a attr2=val2
